creator: Scrapp LLC
descriptionHtml:
Instantly see which items are recyclable in your area and get rewarded for protecting our planet.

Here’s how it works:

1. Scan a product’s barcode, add the packaging and get local recycling information. Each time you submit new packaging data you help others to recycle right too!

2. Sort your packaging by following the simple instructions, track your impact, help to eliminate single-use plastic! And you’ll earn rewards for your efforts.

3. These rewards are called Scrapp points. You can spend these points on your favourite eco-friendly products or services in the app. Clever, huh?

4. And that’s not all. Because you can also donate points to causes for good, such as projects working to eliminate ocean-bound plastic, thanks to our partnership with NGO Plastic Bank.

5. Add friends to see how your progress stacks up on the leaderboard. Engage with a growing community and inspire others to get involved and create a less wasteful future for all. Because change is infectious.

Join the recycling revolution today.

Follow us @scrapprecycling Questions? Contact us at enquiries@scrapprecycling.com

Note: Local recycling rules are only available in the UK at the moment. You can access conservative guidance in any other area, and we’re hoping to expand our coverage for Canada and North America very soon.

descriptionShort: Recycle Right, Earn Rewards, Save the Planet
title: Scrapp - Recycling made simple

creator: Scrapp LLC
descriptionHtml:
See how to recycle any household product correctly. Simply scan the barcode to sort packaging into the right bin - according to your local recycling rules.

With Scrapp, the more products you scan, the better recycler you’ll become. And together, the more plastic pollution we can stop from entering our oceans. So you can live guilt-free and feel confident that your efforts will never go to waste.

Join our growing community today and discover how small habits can make a big impact!

** HOW DOES IT WORK? **

Scan a product on the shelf or at home.
Point your phone camera at the barcode - Scrapp instantly tells YOU how to dispose of it correctly by:

- Displaying simple instructions like “Recycle,” “Do Not Recycle,” or “Sort Packaging.”
- A step-by-step guide that shows which bin each packaging part should go in.
- Motivational messages that make you feel like a recycling hero.

** LOCAL GUIDANCE FOR 97M+ PEOPLE **

Scrapp automatically saves your local recycling rules to give you the most accurate guidance. Our partnerships with program managers ensure that any changes can be instantly updated in the app.

** TRACK YOUR IMPACT **

View a breakdown of products you’ve scanned. Track progress towards your low-waste goals and get actionable insights about your recycling efforts.

** FIGHT PLASTIC POLLUTION TOGETHER **

So far, Scrapp has been successfully used to divert over 10,000 items from ending up in landfill - and we’re just getting started.

Each time you use the Scrapp App to recycle right, you also remove ocean-bound plastic. That’s because we’re teaming up with the World’s Leading Plastic Action Platform, rePurpose. With their help, we’re making it possible for you to remove ocean-bound plastic - one scan at a time.

** 100K+ PRODUCTS SO FAR **

We work directly with brands and retailers to use their data for good. But you can help others to recycle right too. Because each time you submit new packaging information, it gets added to our library and shared with the rest of the community.

** DISCOVER SUSTAINABLE BRANDS **

Look out for the green verified tick next to brands in the app - it means the information you’re seeing comes straight from one of our verified brand partners.

We’re proud to be helping sustainable brands & retailers clear up confusing environmental claims and make more responsible products that have a positive impact on the planet.

** WHERE DOES THE APP WORK? **

Scrapp supports local guidance in the following areas:
United Kingdom (England, Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland)
USA (California, New York, Massachusetts, Connecticut, New Hampshire, Vermont, Rhode Island)

Good news - you can still use the app even if we don’t support local guidance in your area yet. You’ll see general advice that is correct for most places.

Our goal is to empower the entire world with free, local, and accurate recycling guidance. So we appreciate your patience as we work tirelessly towards this mission.

--
Want to get in touch with us?
Please send us a message: enquiries@scrapprecycling.com

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
With the release of Scrapp 2.0, our clever little recycling app was entirely redesigned to make it even easier, faster, and more fun to use. Based on some initial feedback, we’re excited to be making a couple of additions including (drumroll, please):

- bug fixes
- submit changes to packaging information.
- Discover verified, sustainable brands.
- Made the scan flow easier to understand
- Every product you scan now shows up in your history page.
- Added over 100K products to our library.

title: Scrapp - Recycling made simple

creator: Scrapp LLC
descriptionHtml:
See how to recycle any household product correctly. Simply scan the barcode to sort packaging into the right bin - according to your local recycling rules.

With Scrapp, the more products you scan, the better recycler you’ll become. And together, the more plastic pollution we can stop from entering our oceans. So you can live guilt-free and feel confident that your efforts will never go to waste.

Join our growing community today and discover how small habits can make a big impact!

** HOW DOES IT WORK? **

Scan a product on the shelf or at home.
Point your phone camera at the barcode - Scrapp instantly tells YOU how to dispose of it correctly by:

- Displaying simple instructions like “Recycle,” “Do Not Recycle,” or “Sort Packaging.”
- A step-by-step guide that shows which bin each packaging part should go in.
- Motivational messages that make you feel like a recycling hero.

** LOCAL GUIDANCE FOR 97M+ PEOPLE **

Scrapp automatically saves your local recycling rules to give you the most accurate guidance. Our partnerships with program managers ensure that any changes can be instantly updated in the app.

** TRACK YOUR IMPACT **

View a breakdown of products you’ve scanned. Track progress towards your low-waste goals and get actionable insights about your recycling efforts.

** FIGHT PLASTIC POLLUTION TOGETHER **

So far, Scrapp has been successfully used to divert over 10,000 items from ending up in landfill - and we’re just getting started.

Each time you use the Scrapp App to recycle right, you also remove ocean-bound plastic. That’s because we’re teaming up with the World’s Leading Plastic Action Platform, rePurpose. With their help, we’re making it possible for you to remove ocean-bound plastic - one scan at a time.

** 100K+ PRODUCTS SO FAR **

We work directly with brands and retailers to use their data for good. But you can help others to recycle right too. Because each time you submit new packaging information, it gets added to our library and shared with the rest of the community.

** DISCOVER SUSTAINABLE BRANDS **

With Scrapp, the more products you scan, the better recycler you’ll become. And together, the more plastic pollution we can stop from entering our oceans. So you can live guilt-free and feel confident that your efforts will never go to waste.

Join our growing community today and discover how small habits can make a big impact!

** HOW DOES IT WORK? **

Scan a product on the shelf or at home.
Point your phone camera at the barcode - Scrapp instantly tells YOU how to dispose of it correctly by:

- Displaying simple instructions like “Recycle,” “Do Not Recycle,” or “Sort Packaging.”
- A step-by-step guide that shows which bin each packaging part should go in.
- Motivational messages that make you feel like a recycling hero.

** LOCAL GUIDANCE FOR 97M+ PEOPLE **

Scrapp automatically saves your local recycling rules to give you the most accurate guidance. Our partnerships with program managers ensure that any changes can be instantly updated in the app.

** TRACK YOUR IMPACT **

View a breakdown of products you’ve scanned. Track progress towards your low-waste goals and get actionable insights about your recycling efforts.

** FIGHT PLASTIC POLLUTION TOGETHER **

So far, Scrapp has been successfully used to divert over 10,000 items from ending up in landfill - and we’re just getting started.

Each time you use the Scrapp App to recycle right, you also remove ocean-bound plastic. That’s because we’re teaming up with the World’s Leading Plastic Action Platform, rePurpose. With their help, we’re making it possible for you to remove ocean-bound plastic - one scan at a time.

** 100K+ PRODUCTS SO FAR **

We work directly with brands and retailers to use their data for good. But you can help others to recycle right too. Because each time you submit new packaging information, it gets added to our library and shared with the rest of the community.

** DISCOVER SUSTAINABLE BRANDS **

Look out for the green verified tick next to brands in the app - it means the information you’re seeing comes straight from one of our verified brand partners.

We’re proud to be helping sustainable brands & retailers clear up confusing environmental claims and make more responsible products that have a positive impact on the planet.

** WHERE DOES THE APP WORK? **

Scrapp supports local guidance in the following areas:
United Kingdom (England, Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland)
USA (California, New York, Massachusetts, Connecticut, New Hampshire, Vermont, Rhode Island)

Good news - you can still use the app even if we don’t support local guidance in your area yet. You’ll see general advice that is correct for most places.

Our goal is to empower the entire world with free, local, and accurate recycling guidance. So we appreciate your patience as we work tirelessly towards this mission.

--
Want to get in touch with us?
Please send us a message: enquiries@scrapprecycling.com

title:
Scrapp - Recycling made simple
3.1.7

creator: Scrapp LLC
descriptionHtml:
See how to dispose any waste item correctly. Simply scan the barcode, or search the item, to learn the correct bin to put your waste - according to your local disposal rules.

Scrapp takes an education-first approach, to help you be better equipped on disposing your waste correctly. So you can live guilt-free and feel confident that your efforts are having maximum impact.

Join our growing community today and discover how small habits can make a big impact!

** HOW DOES IT WORK? **

1. Scan or search a product on the shelf or at home.
2. Point your phone camera at the barcode - Scrapp instantly tells you how to dispose of it correctly by:

(a) Displaying simple instructions like “Recycle,” “Do Not Recycle,”, “Sort Packaging" or "Compost".
(b) A step-by-step guide that shows which bin each packaging part should go in.
(c) Motivational messages that make you feel like a recycling hero.

** LOCAL GUIDANCE FOR 400M+ PEOPLE **

Scrapp automatically saves your local recycling rules to give you the most accurate guidance. We currently provide location-based recycling guidance across 100% of the UK, US and Canada. Our internal team reviews frequently, but if there is ever something that awry, you can reach out to our team who will be happy to assist.

Good news - you can still use the app even if we don’t support local guidance in your area yet. You’ll see general advice that is correct for most places.

** TRACK YOUR IMPACT **

View a breakdown of waste you’ve disposed. Track progress towards your zero-waste goals and get actionable insights about your recycling efforts.

** FIGHT PLASTIC POLLUTION TOGETHER **

So far, Scrapp has been successfully used to divert over 10,000 items from ending up in landfill - and we’re just getting started.

Each time you use Scrapp to dispose of your waste the right way, you also remove ocean-bound plastic. For every item you scan or search, we’re making it possible for you to remove ocean-bound plastic - one bottle at a time.

** 36M+ PRODUCTS SO FAR **

We work directly with brands and retailers to use their data for good. But you can help others to dispose of your waste correctly too. Each time you submit new packaging information, it gets added to our library and shared with the rest of the community.

** DISCOVER SUSTAINABLE BRANDS **

Look out for the green verified tick next to brands in the app - it means the information you’re seeing comes straight from one of our verified brands.

We’re proud to be helping sustainable brands & retailers clear up confusing environmental claims and make more responsible products that have a positive impact on the planet.

Our mission is to educate and empower a global community towards a circular future. So we appreciate your patience as we work tirelessly towards this mission.

--
Want to get in touch with us?
Please send us a message: enquiries@scrapprecycling.com

Good news - you can still use the app even if we don’t support local guidance in your area yet. You’ll see general advice that is correct for most places.

** TRACK YOUR IMPACT **

View a breakdown of the waste you’ve disposed. Track progress towards your zero-waste goals and get actionable insights about your disposal habits.

** FIGHT PLASTIC POLLUTION TOGETHER **

So far, Scrapp has been successfully used to divert over 60,000+ items from ending up in landfill - and we’re just getting started.

Each time you use Scrapp to dispose of your waste the right way, you also remove ocean-bound plastic. For every item you scan or search, we’re making it possible for you to remove ocean-bound plastic - one bottle at a time.

** 36M+ PRODUCTS SO FAR **

We work directly with brands and retailers to use their data for good. But you can help others to dispose of your waste correctly too. Each time you submit new packaging information, it gets added to our library and shared with the rest of the community.

** DISCOVER SUSTAINABLE BRANDS **

Look out for the green verified tick next to brands in the app - it means the information you’re seeing comes straight from one of our verified brands.

We’re proud to be helping sustainable brands & retailers clear up confusing environmental claims and make more responsible products that have a positive impact on the planet.

Our mission is to educate and empower a global community towards a circular future. So we appreciate your patience as we work tirelessly towards this mission.

--
Want to get in touch with us?
Please send us a message: enquiries@scrappzero.com
